text: Death Angel is a thrash metal band from Concord, California. They played from 1982 to 1991. In 2001 they started to play again. All of their members are from the Philippines. The members are: Mark Osegueda (vocals) Rob Cavestany (guitar, vocals), Ted Aguilar (guitar), Andy Galeon (drums), Dennis Pepa (bass, vocals) ==Discography== *Kill as One (1986) (demo) *The Ultra-Violence (1987) *Frolic Through the Park (1988) *Act III (1990) *Fall From Grace (1990) (live album) *The Art of Dying (2004) *Killing Season (2008) *Relentless Retribution (2010) *The Dream Calls for Blood (2013) *The Evil Divide (2016) *Humanicide (2019) Category:People from Concord, California Category:Musical groups established in 1982 Category:1982 establishments in California Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1991 Category:1991 disestablishments in the United States Category:1990s disestablishments in California Category:2000s American music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in California Category:2010s American music groups Category:Thrash metal bands Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups from California Category:Enigma Records artists
title: Death Angel
